content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position 0, 0)

### Burner Mining Drill at position (42, -83)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 42, -83)

### Wooden Chest at position (42.5, -81.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position 42.5, -81.5)

### Burner Mining Drill at position (-15, -50)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position -15, -50)

### Copper Plate Mine at position (-15, -50)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position -15, -50) for mining Iron Ore

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough resources in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory frequently.

### Errors when using Burner Mining Drill without fuel
- Always ensure that the Burner Mining Drill has fuel before expecting it to work. Check the fuel status and replenish as needed.

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance for placing an entity is 10 units.

### Errors when trying to place an entity without it in inventory
- Make sure the entity you are trying to place is actually in your inventory. Check your inventory before attempting to place an entity.

### NAMESPACE

#### Utility Functions
- `place_entity`: Used to place entities on the map. 
  - Failure Mode: Could not place wooden-chest due to being too far away or not having the entity in inventory.
  - Success Mode: Successfully places entities when within range and available in inventory.

#### Important Variables
- `burner-mining-drill`: Type: Item
- `wooden-chest`: Type: Item
- `stone-furnace`: Type: Item
- `coal`: Type: Item
- `iron-gear-wheel`: Type: Item
- `iron-plate`: Type: Item
- `iron-ore`: Type: Item
- `drop_position`: Type: Position (x=-14.5, y=-48.5)
